utterance.speaker: Singer
utterance.content: ‘Cause every time I see your face, I can’t help but fall from grace. I know.....

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! This girl is good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh-ho yeah! A song with rhyming words. Oo, I never thought of that before.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I like her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why? Because she can sing and play guitar and do both at the same time?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, that’s pretty much all I’m looking for from these people.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look at you. All jealous.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah Pheebs, come on, you two have completely different styles. Y'know, she’s more.. y'know, and you’re more

utterance.speaker: Singer
utterance.content: beside meeeee-eeee-ee. .

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, see, see, everyone else is happy she’s done.

utterance.speaker: Singer
utterance.content: Okay, my next song’s called: Phoebe Buffay, What Can I Say. I Really Loved When We Were Singing Partners, And I Shouldn’t Have Left You That Way.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, one of those ‘look for the hidden meaning’ songs.

utterance.speaker: Singer
utterance.content: Hey Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Leslie, how’d you know I’d be here?

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: I ran into Vlad at the place where they sell the big fish, and he said you played here a lot, so umm....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right listen, I have to go to the bathroom, but if the place with the big fish comes up again. I’d like know whether that’s several big fish or just one big fish.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So ah, Phoebe tells us you write jingles.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Actually I said she abandoned me to write jingles.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, anything we might of heard of?

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Ah, yeah, umm. Home is never far away..

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Yeah, but, I don’t do that anymore. I got kinda sick of it, and then I couldn’t come up with anything good, so they fired me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hmm, bummer.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Well, I y'know, I was just, umm, I was just thinking and hoping, that umm, maybe you’d want to get back together?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No. But thanks.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Aw come on Phoebe would you just think about it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. No. But thanks.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Okay, ah, see ya Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, that was kinda brutal.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well okay, let this be a lesson to all of you, all right. Once you, once you betray me, I become like the ice woman, y’know. Very cold, hard, unyielding, y'know nothing, nothing can penetrate this icy exterior. Can I have a tissue, please?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, sure.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Someone in there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. This is just part of a dare devil game that I play called ‘wait until the last moment before I burst and die.’

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Jeez, man did you fall.. Hi! So ah, did ya, did-did-did ya fall high?

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Someone was in the lady's room, I couldn’t wait. I left the lid up for ya though.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know what Gunther, go ah, go ahead, I’m-I’m talking to ah, . This is the part where you say your name.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Ginger.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ginger. I’m talking to Ginger, so....

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Don’t you have to use the bathroom?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nope, nope, I’d just ah, I’d rather talk to you. Yes, I do. Yes, I do have to go to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Someone in here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Where’s Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, he can’t make it, he said he had to his... Whoa-oh!

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Joey? Joey Tribbiani?

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Joey I can see you okay? You’re hiding behind the coats.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Phew, close one.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi, sweetie!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Hi, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, huh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ve got some bad news.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can get a quick bite to eat, but then I have to come back up here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on sweetie! You’ve had to work late every night for the past two weeks, what is it this time?

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Actually, it’s kinda my fault. I-I quit today.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But work comes first! Oh hey, but that’s sad about you though, what happened? Burn out? Burn all out, did ya?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nooo, he’s leaving for a better job.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh well that’s great, so I guess this is ah, this is good bye then. Huh? Good bye.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Okay, then.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well we’re gonna miss you around here.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: Yeah, me too.

utterance.speaker: Mark
utterance.content: So, see ya on Saturday.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, you bet.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know those are a delicacy in India.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, that was Leslie calling again to see if we can get back together. That’s the twentieth time today! And good luck Leslie!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, she must have hurt you pretty bad, huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, yeah. Y'know, we were best friends, ever since we were little, our Moms worked on the barge together.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, you two must have been so cute running around on a barge.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You never run on a barge!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is ah, is Chandler around?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, umm, he met some girl at the coffee house.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oooh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, Ginger something.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nooo. No, no, ah, are you sure it wasn’t something that sounded like Ginger, like ah, Gingeer?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, it was Ginger. I remember, because when he told me, I said, ‘the movie star.’

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aww, man. That’s the girl I was hiding from. When she finds out he’s my roommate, she’s gonna tell him what I did.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, what did you do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What, oh, oh, oh, no, no, I can’t, I can’t tell you that, it’s like the most awful, horrible thing I’ve ever done my whole life.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know what, don’t tell us. We’ll just wait until Chandler gets home, because it’ll be more fun that way.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right!! Okay, it was like four years ago. Okay, Ginger and I had gone out a few times, and then this one weekend, we went up to her Dad’s cabin. Just me, her, and her annoying little dog Pepper. Well that night, I cooked this really romantic dinner....

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You gave her food poisoning!?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I wish. No. After dinner, me, her, and Pepper all fell asleep in front of the fire. Well I woke up in the middle of the night and I saw that the fire was dying out. So, I picked up a log and threw it on. Or, at least what I thought was a log.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!! You threw Pepper on the fire!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I wish. See, I guess another thing I probably should’ve told you about Ginger is that she kinda has a ah, artificial leg.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Joey, what did you do after you threw her leg on the fire?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I ran!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, that’s the best kiss I’ve had with anyone I’ve ever met in a men’s room.

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Actually, me too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Op, foot in a puddle, foot all in a puddle.

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Oh damn, I hate that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, we’re gonna have to get you out of those shoes.

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Oh, don’t worry about it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, really you’re gonna freeze.

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: No, I’m not.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re not, what do you, what do you got a bionic foot?

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Some day, maybe.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Funny book?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmmm. Oh, no, no, I just thinking about something funny I heard today. Umm, Mark, Mark saying ‘I’ll see you Saturday.’

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, at the lecture, I told you that last week, you said you didn’t mind.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, no, no, no, it’s-it’s not the lecture ah, I mind, umm....

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, please tell me it’s not because I’m going with Mark.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, well...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!!! Ross!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I’m sorry, but ah, look if you’re not working with him anymore, why do you have to still do stuff with him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because, he’s my friend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, but do you really need another friend? I mean...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, well if I stop playing with Joey and Chandler, can I play with Mark?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is that funny? Am I supposed to be laughing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know, you thought ‘See you Saturday’ was funny. Look honey, Mark is in fashion okay, I like having a friend that I can share this stuff with. You guys would never want to go to a lecture with me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pa-haa!! I would love to go with you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really!?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, hey I-I have clothes, I even pick them out. I mean for, for all you know I could be a fashion..... monger.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Honey, I would love for you to go with me. What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What should I wear, now I’m all nervous.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know they say a watched pot never beeps.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s just y'know, been a couple of hours, and she hasn’t called. Not that I even care, y'know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe why don’t you just call her? You obviously want to.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You think you know me so well.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, don’t ‘cha wanna?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, well I do know you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s what I said.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well so?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can’t. I can’t. She dumped me, I mean I totally trusted her and then one day it was ‘Okay, bye Pheebs’ gone. Y'know what the saddest part is, when we were playing together, that was like the most fun I’ve ever had in like all my lives.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: My best shoes, so good to me. I wear them everyday. Down at the heel, holes in the toes. Don’t care what people say. My feet’s best friends, pals to the end. With them I’m one hot chicky. Though late one night, not much light, I....

utterance.content: I stepped in something icky.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Leslie
utterance.content: Sticky shoes, sticky shoes, always make me smile. Sticky shoes, sticky shoes, next time I’ll.... avoid the..... pillleeeee.

utterance.content: We’re beginning to see a lot of layering of sheer fabrics and colours. For instance a sheer navy blouse over a pink....

utterance.content: I’m really glad we came. You’re so pretty. I love you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Smelly cat, smelly cat, what are they feeding you? Smelly cat, smelly cat, it’s not your fault.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Wow, that’s great.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Y'know you could totally sell this. It’d be perfect for like umm, a kitty litter campaign.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I..., a jingle? No, no-no-no, no.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: What? Why not? You could make a ton of money.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, well if I was in this for the money, I’d be a millionaire by now, y'know. You just got to get out of that jingle head sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Aw, you’re right, you’re right. I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s okay. All right, I’m gonna play song that’s really, really sad. It’s called Magician Box Mix Up.

utterance.speaker: Lecturer
utterance.content: ....oversized bracelets, oversized earrings, oversizing of accessories in general are very popular now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, can I borrow this? My milk’s gone bad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I hate that. I once had a thing of half and half, stole my car.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So umm, how was your date with Ginger?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great. It was great. She’s ah, she’s great, great looking, great personality, she’s greatness.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sounds like she’s got the ah, whole package.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey told you about the leg, huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh God, it freaked me out. Okay, I know it shouldn’t have, but it did. I mean I like her, I don’t want to stop seeing her, but every so often it’s like ‘Hey, y'know what, where’s your leg?’ I mean I’m the smallest person in the world aren’t I? I’m the smallest person in the world.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Morning.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Actually he’s the smallest person in the world.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Heard about the leg burnin’ huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It came up.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen, I ah, I know it’s a longshot. But, by any chance did she find that funny?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So I nodded off a little.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nodded off!! Ross you were snoring. My father’s boat didn’t make that much noise when it hit rocks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on! Forty-five minutes! Forty-five minutes the man talked about strappy backed dresses.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well okay, how about four hours in a freezing museum auditorium listening to Professor Pitstains and he’s ‘Hey everybody! Remember that thing that’s been dead for a gazillion years. Well there’s this little bone we didn’t know it had!’

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: First of all it’s Professor Pittain! And second of all, that little bone, proved that, that particular dinosaur had wings, but didn’t fly.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, see now, what I just heard: blah-blah-blah, blah-blah-blah-blah-blah, blah-blah-blah, blah, blah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what, 100 million people went to see a movie about what I do, I wonder how many people would go see a movie called, Jurassic Parka.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that is so...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no-no, a bunch of out of control jackets take over an island.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know if what I do is so lame, then why did you insist on coming with me this morning? Huh? Was it so I just wouldn’t go with Mark?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. I... I wanted to be with you. I don’t know, I feel like lately, I feel like you’re slipping away from me, y'know. With this new job, and all these new people, and you’ve got this whole other life going on. I-I-I know it’s dumb, but I hate that I’m not a part of it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It’s not dumb. But, maybe it’s okay that you’re not a part of it. Y'know what I mean? I mean it’s like, I-I-I like that you’re not involved in that part of my life.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s a little clearer.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey see, it doesn’t mean that I don’t love you. Because I do. I love you, I love you so much. But my work it’s-it’s for me y'know, I’m out there, on my own, and I’m doing it and it’s scary but I love it, because it’s mine. I, but, I mean is that okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure, I-I-I...

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Your thinking about my leg aren’t you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. No. Actually I forgot, what is the deal with that again?

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: It’s okay if it bothers you. Really. I mean the only thing I need to know is: ‘How much it bothers you?’ because I don’t like wasting my time. Am I wasting my time?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. No. I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Okay. It’s just like anything else, you just have to get used to it.

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: What’s that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s-that’s my nubbin.

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: What’s a nubbin?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s kinda a ah, a third nipple kinda thing.

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: You have three nipples?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, y'know two regulars. And ah one that barely qualifies as... Ahh, what?

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Nothing. I, I just remembered I have to leave.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You ah, you have, you have to leave, now? How come?

utterance.speaker: Ginger
utterance.content: Ah well, it’s nubbin. Nothing! Umm. Y'know what, I’ll see you later. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I thought you weren’t coming. What? Where were you?

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Come here, come here. Okay, don’t get mad, okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, don’t give me a reason to get mad, okay

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: I played Smelly Cat for the people at my old ad agency, they went nuts.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, look, I told you that I didn’t want you to try and sell it, and you just, you big fat did it anyway. God, y'know what, I think five years ago I probably would’ve done anything to play with you but, I can do it by myself. And if I can’t trust you then just forget it.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: No, no, I don’t want to forget it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay y'know what you have to choose. All right, if-if the most important thing on the planet to you is this cat poopy thing then, okay you can have Smelly Cat, but we won’t be partners. So what’s it gonna be?

utterance.speaker: Commercial
utterance.content: Problem odour in the litter box? Don’t change your kitty, change your kitty litter.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sorry, Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. You okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. I actually am, yeah. Y'know life-life’s gonna had you all kinds of stuff, y'know you learn your little lessons and hopefully you grow. Wanna hear a new song?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’d love too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. ‘Jingle bitch screwed me over! Go to hell jingle whore! Go to hell Go to hell. Go to hell-hell-hell.’ That’s all I have so far.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well hello!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where have you been?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The doctor.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yes! Just had me a little nubbin-ectomy. Yep! Two nipples, no waiting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! It’s like Rachel in High School.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on! Come on, I was kidding! It was such an obvious joke!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was an obvious joke, and I didn’t think of it. Why didn’t I think of it? The source of all my powers. Oh dear God, what have I done!
